comments.author: Werner
comments.body: Anyone up for a really brisk walk over the noon hour? If so, give me a call... -- Mark.

comments.author: Kate B
comments.body: Steve, What is with your obsession with Dave in the bathroom? First the mentor video...now this. You better hope Dave is not all that familiar with the CU harrassment policy. Your concerned sister, Miss Young Young

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: _CU has a harrassmant policy?_ Since when? DU
